Title: Relates to a fee waiver for applications to SUNY and CUNY
Summary: Authorizes a fee waiver for applications to SUNY and CUNY if a prospective student, either a high school senior, or a person completing a gap year, submits and completes the FAFSA form.
LawCode: Amd ยง209-a, add ยง6303-b, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to fee waivers for applications to the state university of New York and the city university of New York
